data.title: Five major tourist attractions in Xingtai, Hebei, are worth your visit!
data.meta_description: Xingtai City, located in the south of Hebei Province, connects Shijiazhuang and Hengshui in the north and Handan in the south.
data.text:
Xingtai City, located in the south of Hebei Province, connects Shijiazhuang and Hengshui in the north and Handan in the south. It is the northern city of Central Plains Urban Agglomeration and the important node city of Beijing Tianjin Hebei Urban Agglomeration. There are four characteristic tourism routes, including landscape tour, leisure agriculture tour, historical and cultural tour, ancient village and famous town tour.

1. Qiannanyu National Forest Park is located in Jiangshui Town in the west of Xingtai County, 60 km away from Xingtai City, with a planning area of 38 km2, and convenient transportation. It is 23 km away from Yunmeng Mountain in the north, 25 km away from groups of valleys in the south, 7 km away from Baiyun Mountain in the east and 7 km away from Jiulong Gorge in the west. It is located in the center of the main scenic spots in Xingtai County, with a planning area of 116.8 km2.

2. Xingtai Grand Canyon is a national 4A scenic spot, a national key scenic spot and a national geopark. Located in Hejiaping Village, Luozhen Town, Southwest Road, Xingtai County, 65 kilometers away from Xingtai city proper.

3. Yunmeng Mountain Scenic Spot (national AAAA scenic spot, national geopark, national key scenic spot) is located in Jijia Village, Xingtai County, at the middle section of Taihang Mountains and the junction of Shanxi and Hebei provinces. It is 65 kilometers away from Xingtai City in the east, with convenient transportation.

Yunmeng Mountain Scenic Area has "high mountain, clear water, quiet canyon, unique cave" and other characteristics.

4. Yingtan Village is located in Luluo Town, western mountainous area of Xingtai County, Hebei Province, more than 60 kilometers away from Xingtai City and 8 kilometers west of Luluo Town. In the ancient village under the hillside, the stone wall is extremely strict under the shade of trees; the high stone gate tower at the east gate of the village is like a small city tower; the stone house in the wall is built along the mountain slope, simple and elegant, with scattered height; the corn on the roof is golden, which forms a simple, beautiful and wonderful picture of the mountain village together with the ancient trees.

5. Kongshan Baiyun Cave is located in Lincheng County, Xingtai City, Hebei Province. It is 6km away from the county seat in the east, 56km away from Xingtai City in the south and 86km away from Shijiazhuang City in the north.

Kongshan Baiyun Cave is a rare karst cave landscape in North China. Four large cave halls have been ascertained and the total area is 4000 square meters.
